title: NVIDIA Corp. stock rises Tuesday, outperforms market
text:
Shares of NVIDIA Corp. 
        NVDA,
        +0.12%
       advanced 3.06% to $563.82 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around dismal trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 0.37% to 4,765.98 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.62% to 37,361.12. NVIDIA Corp. hit a new 52-week high, surpassing its previous peak of $553.46, which the company achieved on January 11th. Trading volume (44.1 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 41.8 M.
